title: what do you think is the best possible matchup in the game
body:
something so one sided one person cant do anything

me personally i think is gangplank vs nasus. gangplank pretty much counters EVERYTHING about him. he outlanes him, outsplitpushes him, out teamfights him, and outscales him at every stage of the game unless nasus gets infinite stacks. 

gp also has 40% armor ignore with his kegs, his w counters nasus w, and his ult does magic damage making it hard to itemize, slows him to kite nasus, and does true damage with the upgrade. 

as gp you can pretty much just free farm in lane. nasus may still get a decent amount of farm, but generally the gangplank can get about 210 farm at 20 and nasus gets about 140.
